panels.description: The total number of VMs that's being created. Including non-running VMs
panels.title: Created VMs

panels.description: The sum of all VM's CPU request
panels.title: Total CPU Request

panels.description: The sum of all VM's RAM request

panels.description: The delta between the pod with highest memory working set or rss and its requested memory for each container, virt-controller, virt-handler, virt-api and virt-operator.

panels.description: Average memory overhead per VM - The estimation of the memory amount required for virt-launcher’s infrastructure components (e.g. libvirt, QEMU)
panels.title: Avg Virt Launcher Memory Overhead

panels.description: The percentage of avaiable memory listed by node
panels.title: Node Available Memory Pecentage
